repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:latest 

ENV TERM=xterm DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive 

RUN npm install -g casperjs phantomjs slimerjs && apt-get update && \  
cd / && \
 apt-get -qqy --no-install-recommends install curl fontconfig ca-certificates && \
rm -rf ~/.npm && npm cache clear --force && \
rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
